title: Happy Birthday Cho'Gath and Amumu!
body: Yesterday was Cho'Gath and Amumu's birthday. They are now 6 years old and despite their age they are both viable picks right now.So show appreciation for our first voidborn and undead mummy by playing a few games with them.

replies.body: Cho will always have a special place in my heart.

Despite their age they are both viable?  

There has NEVER been a time where amumu wasn't strong or wasn't a good pick.  

Even during the assassin meta, once he hit 6 he destroyed enemy teams.  He is the most sleeper OP of the sleeper OP.  

Cho can have his moment, he isn't always strong.  Happy birthday cho!

Amumu needs to rot a bit.
I never said Amumu was never viable. It's just awesome that a champ that is 6 years old now is still a strong pick. He doesn't need a rework or a VU gameplay-wise. Cho is off and on I feel.

Your post implied to me that, do to their age, these champions had moments of dust-gathering where they were essentially unplayable.  I think this because you said they are "both viable picks right now," therefore we should celebrate and show appreciate for these old guys.  

I was just pointing out that amumu has always been way too strong and doesn't need any celebrating.

I think he's trying to imply that Amumu has been even more than viable, but as to why he said "There has never been a time where amumu wasn't strong or wasn't a good pick" I have no idea, that was the whole point of your post and he worded it as if he was trying to prove you wrong.

Happy birthday, {{champion:32}}! Wipe those tears, we all love you.

F*ck you, {{champion:31}}. For all the times you became too tanky to be focused and too damaging to be ignored. And making my lane hell.
Cant play him cuz he's banned in every single game (Cho).

> [{quoted}](name=FLiQ Gr1d1ron,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=W7JptlPG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-27T20:01:30.416+0000)
>
> Cant play him cuz he's banned in every single game (Cho).

Who bans Cho in ranked?

You don't?
May RNG have mercy on your poor soul
He's banned because everything which is tanky as fck and still deals enough damage to 100-0 any squishies is just incredibly frustrating to play against. That's also why volibear is banned sometimes

Cho in either mid or top can be really annoying. This is why I CONSTANTLY play him. Once you figure out your enemies attack patterns it becomes trivial to Q W them and make the afraid to try it again. Getting ganked? Like Cho cares. Q W walk away. E slowly ticks away at health while farming and it will take 10 minutes for your enemy to realize this is happening. His Ult, aside from the obvious health and true damage, comes with a "This person will die" Indicator making its use very easy. Finally No matter how you build him he gets tons of health. Even as a tank Cho's extra health allows for room to buy some damage.

Cho is so incredibly hard to gank successfully that every lane becomes a farm lane, which favors chogath because of his devastating teamfight capability.  This amount of safety and power is why he gets banned.
People who want to play assassin mids. Cho is an assassin's worst nightmare in lane cause he's just too tanky to solo kill.
As a Cho'Gath mid main, everyone.
{{champion:32}} No one came to my birthday party
